com.beepell.execution.event
Class MessageEventHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.beepell.execution.event.MessageEventHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
InboundMessageActivity
public class MessageEventHandler
extends Object
implements InboundMessageActivity

Handler to register with message broker and handle instance creation of events.

Author:
Tim Hallwyl

messageEnqueued

public InboundMessageActivity messageEnqueued()
Used by message broker to notified that a message has been received for this event handler and is awaiting a receive activity. This handler will then create a instance of the event.

Returns:
the conceptual receive activity.
